title: What Happens to the Pro-Choice Movement Now?
description:
The pro-choice movement is in the wilderness. For activists serving women on the margins, that’s been clear for years. 
Guest: Laurie Bertram Roberts, executive director of the Yellowhammer Fund. 
Slate Plus members get bonus segments and ad-free podcast feeds. Sign up now.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:title: What Happens to the Pro-Choice Movement Now?
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: Reproductive justice activists are picking up where pro-choice proponents left off.
